function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High social media use during the pandemic","Impact":"Increased anxiety and psychological disorders","Mitigation":"Provide online therapy and decrease comparison-based content","Technologies":"Online therapy platforms, content filtering algorithms","People":"Social media users","Owner":"Psychologists and Psychiatrist Associations"},{"Description":"Lack of information sharing about recoveries from COVID-19","Impact":"Increased panic and anxiety among the public","Mitigation":"Share information from recovered cases to reassure the public","Technologies":"Online information sharing platforms, social media","People":"General public","Owner":"Health Ministries of Countries"},{"Description":"Increased isolation leading to permanent psychological disorders","Impact":"Long-term mental health effects and potential increase in divorce rates","Mitigation":"Provide online content to decrease anxiety and increase awareness","Technologies":"Online content creation, video circulation","People":"Isolated individuals, married couples","Owner":"Psychologists and Psychiatrist Associations"}]}
